{"id":273126359,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 11 months","timestamp":1572012991,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"116 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/273126359/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Contiguous Array","memory":"19.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findMaxLength(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int maxLength = 0;\n        int sz = nums.size();\n        unordered_map<int, int> a; //Balance and index\n        int currentBalance = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < sz; ++i) {\n            currentBalance += nums[i] * 2 - 1;\n            if(currentBalance == 0) maxLength = i + 1;\n            if(a.find(currentBalance) == a.end()) {\n                a[currentBalance] = i;\n            } else {\n                maxLength = max(maxLength, i - a[currentBalance]);\n            }\n        }\n        return maxLength;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"contiguous-array"}
